tasks.label: Follow docker logs
tasks.command:
clear && echo "Starting a docker container for an RAWeb preview.
This uses a trial version of Windows Server. Do not use this for any purpose other than previewing RAWeb without purchasing a Windows Server license from Microsoft.

Initial setup can take several minutes. The following steps will occur:
 - Download Windows
 - Install Windows
 - Configure Windows
 - Install RAWeb

The URLs below can be used to monitor the install process and launch RAWeb (when ready).

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Monitor Windows Install: https://$CODESPACE_NAME-8006.$GITHUB_CODESPACES_PORT_FORWARDING_DOMAIN
Preview RAWeb: https://$CODESPACE_NAME-80.$GITHUB_CODESPACES_PORT_FORWARDING_DOMAIN/RAWeb

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Username: rawebadmin
Password: raweb

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
" && sudo chmod 666 /var/run/docker.sock && docker logs -f windows
